block.p: Mr. and Mrs. John V. Thornton of Bronxville, N.Y., have announced the engagement of their daughter Laura McNiece Thornton to David Guy Pellegrino, a son of Pamela B. Pellegrino of Fort Salonga, N.Y., and Louis A. Pellegrino of Patchogue, L.I. A June wedding is planned.

Ms. Thornton is a financial operations coordinator with the Women's International Professional Tennis Council in New York. She graduated from Colby College. Her father, a retired vice chairman of the Consolidated Edison Company, is counsel to Whitman & Ransom, a law firm in New York. Her mother, Edna L. Thornton, is a lawyer in Bronxville.

Ms. Thornton is a financial operations coordinator with the Women's International Professional Tennis Council in New York. She graduated from Colby College. Her father, a retired vice chairman of the Consolidated Edison Company, is counsel to Whitman & Ransom, a law firm in New York. Her mother, Edna L. Thornton, is a lawyer in Bronxville.

Mr. Pellegrino is an assistant vice president of Marsh & McLennan, the insurance brokerage, in New York. He graduated from the University of Maryland. His mother is a real-estate appraiser in Northport, L.I. His father is the president of the Profile Coverage Corporation, an insurance brokerage in Patchogue.
